projects.title: Portfolio Website
description: Construct front-end framework in functional language Elm with Model-View-Update structure
Conceptualize and build responsive UI with customized Elm APIs, CSS, JavaScript, and HTML
Test elm-ui-bootstrap API for quality assurance and enhance code functionality before release
Create multiple JSON decoders to display similar text layout without hardcoding
note: Since this spring, I wanted to build my portfolio website but without any previous knowledge of web development, I was debating whether I should code or use a template until I came across Elm.
For the first 2 weeks of August, I learned the basics of Elm through online tutorials. It is my first functional praogramming language after two years of OOP and it has been fascinating.
As a beginner web devloper, I was able to follow most of my UI design and implement the website within the LAST 2 WEEKS of August! (Wait, What?
